column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2020
column14: I specifically got this to wear under face mask so I don't have to continually put on/take off with mask. I only bought the color but not the sealer. I was surprised by the sting on the lips & how you need to keep mouth open for several minutes to dry. I personally do not like this or the potential skin damage it does. But it is a good option during covid if you want lipstick to wear under a mask.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2019
column14: I have used multiple Lipsense lipsticks and this is the first one that the color doesn't stay on.  I have tried multiple layers but it still comes off after a hour at the corners of my mouth and the inside so that by the end of the day it looks like all I'm wearing is bright red lip liner.  Pretty color but I am going to have to throw away because not staying on defeats the whole purpose of paying more for this brand.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2020
column14: For a true lip enhancement blu red is it. A fabulous color that makes your teeth appear WHITE! Lots of compliments! People insist your teeth were whiten!

column14: Love this long-lasting lipstick!  It is the perfect color for my skin tone!  Goes with everything!
